Interrupts.Name: Get Down Sir!
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally adjacent to an auxiliary is targeted by an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: That auxiliary is defeated. The ally gains resistance against the triggering ability and is shoved 1 in any direction after it resolves.

Actions.Name: Fusillade
Actions.Effects: Another [name] can deal 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 6 of them.

Actions.Name: Focus Fire
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 of any [name] becomes marked. While marked, they are vulnerable+ and cannot benefit from cover, stealth, dodge, or evasion. A foe can end this mark by dropping to the ground at the start of their turn, becoming immobile and unable to attack for the duration of that turn.
